notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This study supported by Center of Liquid Biopsy (KMU-TC108B06) and Center for Cohort Research Center KMU-TC108B07, KMU-DK109002 (HCC cohort) and Center of Cancer Research (KMU-TC108A04-0), Kaohsiung Medical University in Taiwan. This study is supported partially by the grants from the Ministry of Science Technology (MOST) grant (108-2314-B-037-079-MY3); Kaohsiung Medical University (KMU-Q108009), (KMU-Q109005), (108-CCH-KMU-001).
